mapper.select: SELECT mgmt_service_config.* FROM mgmt_service_config INNER JOIN mgmt_service ON mgmt_service_config.service_id = mgmt_service.id WHERE mgmt_service.name = #{serviceName} AND mgmt_service_config.is_default = 1

SELECT mgmt_service_config.* FROM mgmt_service_config INNER JOIN mgmt_service ON mgmt_service_config.service_id=mgmt_service.id WHERE mgmt_service.name=#{serviceName} AND mgmt_service_config.config_version=#{configVersion}

SELECT mgmt_service_config.id, mgmt_service_config.name, mgmt_service_config.config_version, mgmt_service_config.is_default, mgmt_service_config.service_id, mgmt_service_config.source, mgmt_service_config.public_time, mgmt_service_config.creation_date, mgmt_service_config.created_by, mgmt_service_config.last_update_date, mgmt_service_config.last_updated_by, mgmt_service_config.object_version_number FROM mgmt_service_config INNER JOIN mgmt_service on mgmt_service_config.service_id=mgmt_service.id WHERE mgmt_service.name=#{serviceName}
SELECT config_version FROM mgmt_service_config WHERE id = #{id}
